name: Subject Debris
description:
Subject Debris is an indie 3D Dungeon-crawler game


You will play as Reid, a person with memory loss, who wakes up in an abandoned laboratory. Your mission is to go deep into the last floor and destroy a dangerous test subject.


- Level up your character, loot and equip weapon
- Freely change between third or first person view
- Two different story route (will update more in future)
- Kill monster or run away from them, it's your choice
- Use 'Night vision' to navigate in darkness
